content.description: Sit Start with left hand on an undercling and right hand on the pinch on the the low flake. Move up to the flat edge and then trend diagonally up and left following the lightning bolt up the slab to top out in the middle, sharing the finish with The Long Way Around.
content.protection: A couple of Pads and a Spotter.
content.location: From the Deception Crag Parking Lot head up the trail to find several large boulders trailside. From the trailside walk around the left to the back of the large boulder to find the start.

content.description: Sit start matched on the low block about 3 feet right of the left arete. Move straight up using the arete topping out overhead.
content.location: Look for two trailside boulders leaned together.  The start is on the left side of the boulder facing the tree right off of the trail.

content.description: Sit start down in the cave on the second large sharp sidepull.  Move out of the cave left following the lowest ledge line on the trailside face of the boulder.  Finish by moving onto the slab face on the boulder's left side.  A bit contrived.  The use of the larger ledge on the face drops the grade.
content.location: From the Trail look for two boulders leaned together to form a small cave.  The start is in this cave.

content.description: Sit start low matched on the sloped block to the left of the mini-roof.  Find your way up topping out over the apex of the roof. Short and if done right, not painful at all!
content.location: As you walk up to the trailside boulders on your way to the Deception Wall take the first side trail around the back of the first boulder set toward The Long Way Around.  This problem will be on your immediate left.

content.description: Sit start either matched on the block in the middle of the small roof or choose to use the block with the undercling underneath.  Move straight up over the lip through a few powerful compression positions using the rail to the left.  If you are in the area this is a can't miss line!
content.location: As you walk up to the trailside boulders on your way to the deception wall.  At the first boulders take the first trail to the right heading back toward The Long Way Around. The problem will be the second line to your left.

content.description: Start off the large white colored jug pedestal down in the alcove.  Work your way up and right on the steep overhung face.  Crux just before the halfway point and move right around the corner continuing to trend right.  Top out in the center of the slab face.
content.protection: Lots of Pads and aggressive spotters!
content.location: From the trailside walk around to the back of the large boulder to find the start on the low white ledge of the right side of the alcove.

climbs.name: I Saw an OnlyFans Shoot in the Cave

content.description: Balance start with your foot in the pocket and hand on the under cling jug. After the start, only use hands on the crack going up the rock all the way to the finish jug. Use the jug and a sloper for a sketchy top out with no feet
content.location: On the slab face along the trail

content.description: Sit start on low opposing sidepulls.  Move up the face following the arete to the left. Top out at the lip of the arete.  Short but fun!
content.location: From the trail look for two boulders leaned together.  Route is on the left side slab face of the larger of the two boulders.

content.description: Sit start on the second large and sharp sidepull in the cave. Move out left and then immediately up once exiting the cave following some small crimps on the face.  Top out on the boulder's tallest point on the right side of the face.
content.protection: A couple of Pads and a Spotter.
content.location: From the Trail look for two boulders leaned together to form a small cave.  The start is in this cave.
